Title: Ladies and Gentlemen

Actors: Bamshad Abedi-Amin, Richard Attlee, Ciara Baxendale, Eliot Otis Brown Walters
Plot: Rae and Chloe fall out when Chloe admits she is secretly dating their P.E. teacher Stephen Carrisford. There is further disharmony when Chop and Finn invite Rae to a rock concert but not ...
